cast.name: 达尔尚·杰里瓦拉 Darshan Jariwala

writer.name: 阿缇·夏布瑞娅 Aarti Chhabria

director.name: 阿缇·夏布瑞娅 Aarti Chhabria

introduction: "At the end of a game of chess, the King and the pawn, go back together in the same box." This realization hit Krishnakant Jhunjhunwala when he stood at the peak of his career, at the cost of his health. The founder of a 15 hundred crore empire, decided to walk away into oblivion, and live instead of existing. Varanasi gave meaning to his life and awakening to his soul. This is a story of an unending journey beyond the realms of life and death.
